question: Which sport's rules are codified into "Laws of the Game (LOTG)"?
explanation: Association Football's rules are codified into "Laws of the Game (LOTG)". The Laws of the Game (LOTG) are the codified rules of association football. The laws mention the number of players a team should have, the game length, the size of the field and ball, the type and nature of fouls that referees may penalise, the frequently misinterpreted offside law, and many other laws that define the sport. During a match, it is the task of the referee to interpret and enforce the Laws of the Game.
